long_description: Never thought you could run in a dress? With the same high performance fabric as your favorite running gear in a single, stylish piece, the SkirtSports Wonder Girl dress might just change your mind. Breathable polyester and spandex jersey fabric has a soft feel and wicks away moisture to keep you comfortable. Built-in shelf bra provides light support and coverage; SkirtSports recommends it for bra sizes A - C. Front pocket in bra stores energy gels. Racerback promotes unrestricted motion, and rear mesh fabric cools skin as you perspire. SkirtSports Wonder Girl dress features a semi-relaxed fit through the torso to allow freedom of movement; dress falls to mid-thigh. Closeout.
short_description: Never thought you could run in a dress? With the same high performance fabric as your favorite running gear in a single, stylish piece, the SkirtSports Wonder Girl dress might just change your mind.
